sql.query:
UPDATE t_ticket
SET status = :P1 /* {{$_POST.refdeclval}} */, response = :P2 /* {{$_POST.response}} */, reply_date = :P3 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE tran_id = :P4 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET api_ref = :P1 /* {{$_POST.api_ref}} */, extra2 = :P2 /* {{$_POST.refdeclval}} */
WHERE id = :P3 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

SELECT tt_recharge_trans.user_id, tt_recharge_trans.amount, tt_recharge_trans.net_amt, tt_recharge_trans.comm_per, tt_recharge_trans.comm_val, tt_recharge_trans.comm_amt, tt_recharge_trans.other_charge, tt_recharge_trans.charge_per, tt_recharge_trans.charge_amt, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommval, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommamt, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeper, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeval, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeamt, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommper, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommval, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommamt, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeper, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeval, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeamt, tt_recharge_trans.opening_balance, tt_balance.transaction_type, tt_recharge_trans.tr_id
FROM tt_recharge_trans AS tt_recharge_trans
LEFT JOIN tt_balance AS tt_balance ON (tt_balance.pay_ref_id = tt_recharge_trans.id)
WHERE tt_recharge_trans.id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

SELECT balance_amt, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users AS m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetTTBal.user_id}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET extra2 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.refdeclval}} */, api_ref = :P2 /* {{$_POST.api_ref}} */, status = :P3 /* {{'FAILED'}} */, operator_ref = :P4 /* {{'Transaction Failed and Refund'}} */, closing_balance = :P5 /* {{GetTTBal.opening_balance}} */
WHERE id = :P6 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{'FAILED'}} */, updated_by = :P2 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P3 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P4 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */

values.value: {{'Refund of Amount '+GetTTBal.netamt+' for the transaction id '+$_POST.transid}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_balance
(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on, netamt, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetTTBal.user_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetUserBalance.balance_amt.toNumber()}} */, :P3 /* {{GetTTBal.amount}} */, :P4 /* {{RTClosingBal.toNumber()}} */, :P5 /* {{GetTTBal.transaction_type+' Refund'}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P8 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */, :P10 /* {{'Refund of Amount '+GetTTBal.netamt+' for the transaction id '+$_POST.transid}} */, :P11 /* {{identity}} */, :P12 /* {{NOW}} */, :P13 /* {{GetTTBal.net_amt}} */, :P14 /* {{'ADDREFUND'}} */)

params.name: :P10
params.value: {{'Refund of Amount '+GetTTBal.netamt+' for the transaction id '+$_POST.transid}}

sql.query:
UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBal.toNumber()}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetTTBal.user_id}} */

SELECT callbackapi
FROM t_api_token
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{GetTTBal.user_id}} */

SELECT balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetUserBalance.ds_id}} */

SELECT amount, netamt
FROM t_charge_cal
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */ AND user_id = :P2 /* {{GetUserBalance.ds_id}} */

values.value: {{'Recharge Reversal | Amount: '+GetDTBalcance.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit | Ref. Id:\n '+$_POST.transid}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO t_charge_cal
(user_id, old_balance, amount, netamt, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetUserBalance.ds_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetDTUser.balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{GetDTBalcance.amount}} */, :P4 /* {{GetDTBalcance.netamt}} */, :P5 /* {{DTClosingBal}} */, :P6 /* {{'Recharge Comm Reversal'}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, :P8 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P9 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */, :P11 /* {{'Recharge Reversal | Amount: '+GetDTBalcance.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit | Ref. Id:\n '+$_POST.transid}} */, :P12 /* {{identity}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */)

params.name: :P11
params.value: {{'Recharge Reversal | Amount: '+GetDTBalcance.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit | Ref. Id:\n '+$_POST.transid}}

sql.query:
UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{DTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetUserBalance.ds_id}} */

SELECT balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetUserBalance.md_id}} */

SELECT amount, netamt
FROM t_charge_cal
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */ AND user_id = :P2 /* {{GetUserBalance.md_id}} */

values.value: {{'Recharge Reversal | Amount: '+GetMDTBalcance.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit | Ref. Id:  '+$_POST.transid}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO t_charge_cal
(user_id, old_balance, amount, netamt, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetUserBalance.md_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetMDTUser.balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{GetMDTBalcance.amount}} */, :P4 /* {{GetMDTBalcance.netamt}} */, :P5 /* {{MDTClosingBal}} */, :P6 /* {{'Recharge Comm Reversal'}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, :P8 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P9 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.transid}} */, :P11 /* {{'Recharge Reversal | Amount: '+GetMDTBalcance.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit | Ref. Id:  '+$_POST.transid}} */, :P12 /* {{identity}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */)

params.name: :P11
params.value: {{'Recharge Reversal | Amount: '+GetMDTBalcance.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit | Ref. Id:  '+$_POST.transid}}

sql.query:
UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{MDTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetUserBalance.md_id}} */
